---
title: "progress-report-devon-k"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(rvest)

url <- "https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/hof_2025.shtml"
html <- read_html(url)
tables <- html %>% html_table(fill=TRUE)
tables[1]
```

```{r}
library(Lahman)
library(tidyverse)

head(HallOfFame)
head(People)

data <- tables[[1]]
actual_col_names <- data[1, ]
colnames(data) <- actual_col_names
data <- data[-1, ]
head(data, 3)

combinedHOF <- left_join(HallOfFame, People, by = "playerID")

ndata <- data$Name

combinedHOF <- combinedHOF %>% mutate(
  `First Lastname`=paste(`nameFirst`, `nameLast`)
)

final <- combinedHOF %>% filter(`First Lastname` %in% ndata)

View(final)

```
